alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:21AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Eastland and southeastern Stephens Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gunsight, or 11 miles north of Eastland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastland, Ranger, Lake Daniel, Necessity, Gunsight, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Caddo, Staff, Harpersville, Morton Valley, and Olden. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 344 and 357. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
